Instructions:
1. Open Header Alert tab.
2. ID Hold Type (Manual/Systemic).
3. Check SFDC Health; if >95% request Finance Fast-Track.
4. Check GTS; if Denied Party escalate to Compliance.
5. Refresh OMT to sync warehouse.

1. Audit Internal Comments for bottlenecks.
2. Set Case Priority: Critical.
3. Update Reason: Executive Visibility.
4. Tag Regional Director/AE in Chatter.
5. Log Resolution Plan for Lead review.

1. Log into Venlo Gateway.
2. Verify Signature: Driver Drop vs Signed.
3. Match GPS coordinates vs Unity Address.
4. If Discrepancy >50m file Loss Claim; stage replacement.

1. Open Oracle RMA (Type 04).
2. Validate Serial Numbers individually.
3. Generate Hazmat labels if Li-Ion present.
4. Sync RMA ID to SFDC Case Reference field.

1. ID ECCN in Master Part File.
2. Secure C-Level signed EUS.
3. Screen name/address in Denied Parties List.
4. Set Trade Block to Authorized in SFDC.

1. Match Wire to Customer/VAT ID.
2. Query Unity for open invoices (+/- 1% tolerance).
3. Apply via FIFO.
4. Trigger Credit Release in Unity.

1. Verify Tax ID/VAT against VIES/IRS database.
2. Upload Bank Header/Voided Check to Oracle Finance.
3. Check 'Parent Company' links to prevent duplicate Vendor IDs.
4. Assign Payment Terms (Net 30/60) per Regional Director approval.

1. Query VIES for EU VAT or W-9 for US entities.
2. Match Name/Address to Oracle Customer Master.
3. If 'Invalid', set Tax-Exempt flag to 'False'.
4. Re-calculate Order Total in Unity to include local tax/VAT.

1. Check Ship-To region.
2. Select Preferred Carrier (FedEx/DHL/K+N) based on 'Lane Priority'.
3. Generate Commercial Invoice (3 copies).
4. Update Waybill # in Unity Tracking field.

1. Freeze Bin location in Unity WMS.
2. Physical count vs System count.
3. If variance >$500, trigger 'Manager Override'.
4. Post adjustment to Oracle GL; unfreeze bin for picking.

1. Scan for existing Account names to prevent duplicates.
2. Match 'Lead Source' to Marketing Campaign ID.
3. Convert Lead; auto-create Contact and Opportunity.
4. Assign Account Owner based on Territory Map.

1. Scan EUS for 'Red Flag' keywords (Nuclear, Missile, Chemical).
2. Verify 'Ship-To' isn't a residential address.
3. Check CEO signature against public records.
4. Release 'Compliance Hold' in Unity.

1. Open 'Stock Management' in Unity.
2. Enter WEBSO # and Part Number.
3. Set 'Reserve' for 48 hours.
4. If payment not received by T-48, auto-release stock to general pool.

1. Run 'Payment Performance' report in Oracle.
2. If D&B score > 50, approve $10k temporary increase.
3. For >$10k, attach 3 months of Bank Statements.
4. Update 'Credit Limit' field in SFDC Account.

1. Match Invoice to PO Number.
2. Match PO to 'Goods Received Note' (GRN).
3. If price variance <2%, auto-approve for payment.
4. If variance >2%, route to Purchasing Agent for review.

1. ID UN-Number in Part Master.
2. Print Class 9 (Lithium) or Class 3 (Flammable) decals.
3. Attach IATA 'Shipper's Declaration' to outer carton.
4. Mark Waybill as 'Restricted Goods' for carrier handling.
Instructions

1. Open Header Alert tab.
2. ID Hold Type.
3. Email Finance if >95% Health.
column5:
Subject: Fast-Track Request: WEBSO [Number]

Hi Finance,

This order is on a credit hold. The customer SFDC health is above 95%. Please release for immediate shipping.

Best regards,

Instructions:
1. Audit comments.
2. Set Priority: Critical.
3. Tag Director.
column5:
Subject: URGENT: Executive Escalation - Case [Number]

Hi Director,

I am escalating this case for executive visibility due to a bottleneck in the approval chain. Please review at your earliest convenience.

Regards,

Instructions:
1. Query VIES.
2. Match Name/Address.
3. If invalid, email Customer.
column5:
Subject: Action Required: VAT/Tax ID Verification for Arrow Account

Dear Customer,

We were unable to verify your Tax ID. Please provide a copy of your latest certificate so we can process your orders tax-free.

Thank you,

Instructions:
1. Check Ship-To.
2. ID Delay Reason.
3. Email Carrier.
column5:
Subject: Delayed Shipment Inquiry: Waybill [Number]

Hi Team,

This shipment is currently delayed. Can you provide an updated ETA and reason for the hold-up?

Thanks,
